s0002: His mother You Tai clan woman, called Jiang Yuan.
s0003: Jiang Yuan for Emperor Ku first consort.
s0004: Jiang Yuan go wild, see giant footprint, heart pleased happy, wish tread it, tread it yet body move like pregnant.
s0005: Dwell period gave birth son, think not auspicious, abandon narrow lane, horse ox pass all avoid not tread;
s0006: Move place forest, meet mountain forest many people, move away;
s0007: Abandon ditch on ice, flying bird with wings cover protect it.
s0008: Jiang Yuan think divine, then collect raise grow him.
s0009: Initially wished abandon, because name Qi.
s0010: Qi as child, steady like giant will.
s0011: His play, good plant tree hemp bean, hemp bean beautiful.
s0012: When become adult, then good plow farm, observe land suitable, suitable grain sow harvest, people all follow him.
s0013: Emperor Yao heard, raise Qi as farming teacher, world get benefit, have merit.
s0014: Emperor Shun said: 'Qi, common people begin hungry, you Hou Ji sow timely hundred grains.'
s0015: Seal Qi at Tai, number Hou Ji, separate surname Ji clan.
s0016: Hou Ji rise, at Tao Tang, Yu, Xia between, all have excellent virtue.
s0017: Hou Ji die, son Bu Xu establish.
s0018: Bu Xu late years, Xia Hou clan politics decline, leave Ji not attend, Bu Xu with lose office flee Rong Di between.
s0019: Bu Xu die, son Ju establish.
s0020: Ju die, son Gong Liu establish.
s0021: Gong Liu though at Rong Di between, again repair Hou Ji work, attend plow plant, practice land suitable, from Qi, Ju cross Wei, take material use, travelers have provisions, dwellers have store accumulate, people rely celebrate.
s0022: Commoners cherish him, many move protect return.
s0023: Zhou way rise from this begin, thus poets sing joy think virtue.
s0024: Gong Liu die, son Qing Jie establish, state at Bin.
s0025: Qing Jie die, son Huang Pu establish.
s0026: Huang Pu die, son Cha Fu establish.
s0027: Cha Fu die, son Hui Yu establish.
s0028: Hui Yu die, son Gong Fei establish.
s0030: Gong Fei die, son Gao Yu establish.
s0031: Gao Yu die, son Ya Yu establish.
s0032: Ya Yu die, son Gong Shu Zu Lei establish.
s0033: Gong Shu Zu Lei die, son Gu Gong Dan Fu establish.
s0034: Gu Gong Dan Fu again repair Hou Ji, Gong Liu work, accumulate virtue practice righteousness, state people all support.
s0035: Xun Yu Rong Di attack, wish get wealth goods, give them.
s0036: Already again attack, wish get land with people.
s0038: Gu Gong said: 'Have people establish lord, will benefit them.
s0039: Now Rong Di do attack fight, with my land and people.
s0040: People at me, with at them, what different.
s0041: People wish for me fight, kill father son yet lord them, I not endure do.'
s0042: Then with private followers then leave Bin, cross Qi, Ju, pass Liang mountain, stop at Qi below.
s0043: Bin people whole state support old carry weak, all again return Gu Gong at Qi below.
s0044: And other side states hear Gu Gong benevolence, also many return him.
s0045: Then Gu Gong then decline Rong Di customs, yet camp build city wall room houses, yet settle separate dwell.
s0047: People all sing joy, praise virtue.
s0048: Gu Gong have eldest son called Tai Bo, next Yu Zhong.
s0049: Tai Jiang give birth young son Ji Li, Ji Li marry Tai Ren, all wise women, give birth Chang, have holy auspicious.
s0050: Gu Gong said: 'My generation should have rise, perhaps at Chang?'
